name: CoSCAD
description:
WASD to walk; Right and Left arrow to flip through book. The reading section should be played full screen, preferably, so as to not have the words cut off.

*****

As the first century turns to the second, the Communist Society of Critics After Dinner (CoSCAD) begin to build a digital library. Their first offering is the beginning of RED COUNTRY, RED WORLD, a treatise on the country songs that played a part in that Revolution a hundred years past, and an suggestion on how they might be incorporated into teaching the youth under the new mode of production.

*****

CoSCAD is 3D interactive fiction, without any choices. Or maybe it's a science fiction short story presented in an obfuscated manner. Or maybe it's a platform for fiction set in a particular period of our future. Probably it's at least some of these things.

Made for my birthday. Hope you get something out of it. If not, that's okay too.

Made by Ben Gabriel

with (book) cover art by Jamie
